subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Goaltender Martin Brodeur, who will turn 40 in May, has indicated that he would like to play at least one more year, but acknowledged that he had thought a lot about the end of his career.
snippet: Goaltender Martin Brodeur, who will turn 40 in May, has indicated that he would like to play at least one more year, but acknowledged that he had thought a lot about the end of his career.
